page.title: 18Sarisa's Sunday in Woking.
page.content: I am 7 years old. On Sunday, June 2nd I woke up at 7.30am. Daddy, Mummy and Andrew woke up at 8am. Andrew and I got dressed and watched two programmes on Television. We all ate breakfast, toast and boiled eggs or Marmite. We drank tea. Andrew and I went out to play in the garden. I rode my bike. Andrew cleaned the rabbit hutch. Daddy was sanding down a door. Mummy was cooking lunch. Mummy, Andrew and I went swimming. The water in the pool was cold. We came home and we all had lamb chops, potatoes and spring greens. My aunt, uncle and cousin visited us. We played with my cousin,roller-skated and ate orange ice lollies. For tea we had pizzas,milk, raspberry pie and ice cream. They left in the evening. I played with my rabbit, Fluff, and then went to bed.
